snippet: Egyptian officials announced they would investigate disputes over the construction of churches as hundreds gathered in Cairo to mourn the Coptic Christians killed on Sunday.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Egyptian officials announced they would investigate disputes over the construction of churches as hundreds gathered in Cairo to mourn the Coptic Christians killed on Sunday.

headline.main: Egypt Promises to Address Coptic Christians’ Concerns
headline.print_headline: Egypt: Government to Investigate Disputes Over Coptic Churches
headline.seo: Egypt Attempts to Calm Uproar Over Coptic Deaths
